direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods convert an object to a string representation.
Both methods involve transforming data, though one transforms a list and the other a StringBuilder.
Both methods manipulate data structures (list and StringBuilder) by appending elements.
Both methods involve adding elements to a data structure, though one is a list and the other a StringBuilder.
Both methods manipulate data structures, though one removes elements from a list and the other resets a StringBuilder.
Both methods involve adding elements to a data structure, though one is a map and the other a StringBuilder.
Both methods involve adding elements to a data structure, though one is a sorted map and the other a StringBuilder.
Both methods involve transforming data, though one transforms an Iterable and the other a StringBuilder.
Both methods involve searching or manipulating data structures, though one searches a list and the other manipulates a StringBuilder.
Both methods manipulate data structures, though one intersects lists and the other manipulates a StringBuilder.
